rerank.description: If rerank is set to true, the agent will rerank the top-K results from the initial retrieval step. This improves response quality but incurs additional API costs and increases response time.

variables.description: Key-Value pairs Variables. This will be used to replace the variables in the prompt

content.description: Content of the message. Could be text or image url based on the type

instructions.description: Bot instructions. You can use variables like {{name}} to insert the value of the variable name

language.description: Bot language. Supported ISO 639-1 language code

top_k.description: Top K results of knowledge items. Higher value will increase the accuracy of the bot but will also increase the cost

location.description: Where the error occurred, e.g. 'body.items[3].tags' or 'path.thing-id'

value.description: The value at the given location

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
examples: Property foo is required but is missing.

errors.description: Optional list of individual error details

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. This value should not change between occurrences of the error.

type.description: A URI reference to human-readable documentation for the error.

language.description: Bot language. Supported ISO 639-1 language code

top_k.description: Top K results of knowledge items. Higher value will increase the accuracy of the bot but will also increase the cost

data.description: Challenge ID. You need to response back with this challenge ID to complete the request.

This request is sent when the source status is changed.
